sub_title: Breaking the wall between the collaboration of Dev and Ops teams
summary:
Cloud Engineer with roots in the '90s working with different GNU/Linux distributions like Conectiva, Slackware, Debian, and Red Hat. 

My professional background goes through different businesses from startups to telecom companies, from banking to payment services.

I am passionate about cloud computing, infrastructure as code, configuration management, automation with Ansible, and continuous delivery pipelines for Dev teams.

I am putting my energy into intelligent release processes from dev to production, DevOps and SRE practices together with team topologies, and management of container workloads with Openshift and Kubernetes.

awards.title: High Performance IT employee
awards.description: I received from CIO, the award for high performance IT employee when acting as Support Engineer for the production team Operational Support Systems (OSS).

projects.title: Cielo Digital
projects.description: Leading companies’ Digital Transformation we were the first Squad to be formed with a huge challenge: an MVP in 16 weeks. Alongside with McKinsey Company we closely worked with customers understanding their pain points, creating personas, validating hypothesis and establishing KPIs. Together we became a customer oriented Agile team, responding to unpredictability through incremental, iterative work cadences and empirical feedback. We strive to build properly tested product increments within short iterations with the opportunity to assess the direction of a project throughout the development lifecycle.

projects.title: M.A.R.S. - Middleware Advanced Resources and Services
projects.description:
ONE Team, with ONE mission: 

Constantly exceed the customer’s business needs and expectations by providing a one-stop-shopping support for the middleware technology services.

We are a self managed team which offers innovative resources and solutions to our customers.

We are always evolving by applying industry best practices, training, processes, full domain of middleware core technologies to achieve process, engineering and operations excellence.

Our job is to manage, operate, stabilize and optimize the environment as a team serving as one face to the customer.

"Professional Excellence towards Business efficiency and results”

contributors.headline: Breaking the wall between the collaboration of Dev and Ops teams

profile_positions.description: In search of the Golden Paths of Platform Engineering with the Payments Channels Platform squad
profile_positions.title: Product Owner (Platform Team)

profile_positions.description:
- Member of the Platform Squad of the Payments Channels area of ING Wholesale Banking
- Stream global ING standards for continuous delivery pipelines on Azure DevOps with intelligent release processes
- Speed up the onboarding process for teams to get their namespace as a service and move their potential workloads into containers
- Guide teams to deploy reliability toolkits to monitor and log so they can get quick feedback from their systems
- Automate anything that moves!
profile_positions.title: Platform Engineer

profile_positions.description:
- Member of the Payment initiation squad from one of the channels of ING Wholesale Banking.
- Created CI/CD pipelines for Dev teams consuming a variety of as-a-service tools like Jenkins, Artifactory, Gitlab, Ansible Tower, Openshift, TFS, and Azure DevOps pipelines. 
- Configured deployment strategies like blue/green approach in the pipeline with rolling back capabilities using Ansible and VM-based servers.
- Brought different software development practices to run operations like infrastructure acceptance testing with InSpec (Compliance as Code).
- Reduced infrastructure configuration drift from the servers and operations toil from the squad's backlog using Infra as Code and automated Ops/Infra pipelines.
- Advocate of Immutable Infrastructure pipelines (not only with containers) and Continuous Delivery with Spinnaker.
profile_positions.title: DevOps Engineer

profile_positions.description:
- Helped to organize the development teams to achieve multi-cloud Immutable Infrastructure deployments for Java and Angular applications with Spinnaker OSS (created by Netflix) on top of Amazon Web Services (AWS) and Google Cloud Platform (GCP).
- Achieved the next company's infrastructure generation using container workloads with Kubernetes at Google Cloud (GKE).
- Delivered CI/CD pipelines using Jenkins for microservices developed in GoLang in a push-to-deploy fashion with Docker containers on AWS EC2 instances and later with Kubernetes at GCP.
- Configured deployment strategies like Blue/Green and Canary releases.
profile_positions.title: DevOps Evangelist

profile_positions.description:
- Operated a real-time production platform that offers payment processing software and APIs for e-commerce websites and mobile applications, built on top of Amazon Web Services (AWS).
- Managed the stack with an Infra as Code approach with Github, CircleCI, Nomad, Packer, Ansible and Terraform.
- CI/CD evangelist (Fail fast to make development faster through automated end-to-end pipelines)
- SRE evangelist (Based on Google's book SRE - How Google runs their production systems which were released in 2016).
profile_positions.title: DevOps Engineer

profile_positions.description:
- Established together with McKinsey & Company strategic consultancy firm, Cielo's first Digital Transformation Squad focused in Agile, Lean, and DevOps cultures.
- Responsible to broadcast Immutable infrastructure and CI/CD pipelines with different tools like Puppet, Chef, Jenkins over on-premise standard virtualization (VCE Vblock) and Amazon Web Services (AWS).
- Supported distributed systems running over containers using Nginx, Hashicorp Consul, Docker (just before k8s era!), and SOA applications over Oracle WebLogic, Oracle Exalogic and Oracle Enterprise Service Bus.
- Managed incidents with 4 why's principles, root cause analysis, and postmortems.
- SRE evangelist (Based on Google's book SRE - How Google runs their production systems which was released in 2016).
profile_positions.title: Information Technology Specialist

profile_positions.description:
- Part of Customer Delivery teams for TIM Brazil and AIS Thailand projects for Deployment, System Integration Testing (SIT), User Acceptance Testing (UAT), GoLive!
- Managed Linux/Unix OS, Big Data ecosystem (MapR, Hadoop, Oozie, Hive, Pig, ZooKeeper, Kafka, Spark, HBase, CLDB), and other technologies like Oracle and MSSQL Databases,  BI with QlikView, Monitoring (Icinga, Grafana, OpenTSDB)
- Performed root cause analysis to investigate application issues, patched application deployments, and installations. Assured production systems availability and health.
- Involved with testing the system, including unit testing of middleware and complete end-to-end testing of the application
- Trainned customers Operational teams to handle the product (NOC, L1, L2, L3)
- Escalation focal point for all  levels of Support
- Bash Scripting development
profile_positions.title: Global Support and Big Data Engineer

profile_positions.description:
- Part of Customer Delivery team for Entel (Chile), Nextel (subsidiary of Sprint in Argentine) and Claro (Paraguay, Argentine and Uruguay) on customer's site for Deployment, System Integration Testing (SIT), User Acceptance Testing (UAT), GoLive!
- Managed Linux/Unix OS and middleware technologies like JBoss Application Server, Oracle Database 10/11g, MSSQL Server 2003/2005, BI (QlickView), Monitoring Integration Support (Patrol, In-house scripting with Bash)
- Trainned customer’s Operational and Marketing teams to handle product configuration, application support, operations and report generation
- Bash Scripting development
profile_positions.title: Technical Account Specialist & Support Engineer Latin America

profile_positions.description:
- Part of Customer Delivery team for Brasil Telecom (BRT) project on customer's site for Deployment, System Integration Testing (SIT), User Acceptance Testing (UAT), GoLive!
- Managed Linux/Unix OS and middleware technologies like JBoss Application Server, Oracle Database 10/11g, MSSQL Server 2005, BI with QlikView, Monitoring with BMC Patrol
- Trainned customer’s Operational teams to handle product updates and maintenance
- Report Generation
- Bash Scripting development
profile_positions.title: Integration & Support Engineer Brazil

profile_positions.description:
- First time working in a startup model for the Israeli companies eWave and Pontis, in a project for Brasil Telecom (BrT) later Oi S/A, the largest fixed telephone operator and the fourth mobile telephone operator in Brazil
- Part-time consultant for Oracle WebLogic suite, IBM WebSphere application server and Red Hat JBOSS application server for the region of the Brazilian capital
profile_positions.title: Senior Software Analyst

profile_positions.description:
-  Managed IBM WebSphere Application Server Network Deployment 6.0 ecosystem, configuration of environments DTAP, troubleshooting and problem resolution
- Support of a Continuous Delivery deployment pipeline with automations developed in different scripting languages (Bash, Jython and Perl) to manage daily deployments for more than +500 applications worldwide
- Member of the Global Performance tuning team for Java EE applications
- Participated on a 3 months team integration and training on-site at HSBC USA to understand the role with the objective to be part of a offshore team based in Brazil to support 24x7 bank's mission critical applications
profile_positions.title: Software Analyst

profile_positions.description:
- Managed middleware technologies like Apache HTTP, Tomcat, OC4J, BEA Weblogic Server 8/9, BEA Aqualogic Service Bus, BEA Aqualogic Data Services.
- Performed activities such as product installation, configuration management, performance tuning, troubleshooting, capacity planning, and others to ensure the availability and performance of Java based production environments
- Portal GVT and OSS services were running more than 100 systems with more than 4,000 services (WebServices, EJB's)
- First time experience with Continuous Integration and Continuous Delivery practices using tools like SVN, Maven, Ant, Bamboo, Hudson and other automations in Bash scripting orchestrated with BMC Control-M workflows for building and deploying Java EE applications
profile_positions.title: Production Support Engineer

profile_positions.description:
- Application and Network monitoring with BMC Patrol
- Real-time Jobs execution for Mediation, Billing and OSS tasks with BMC Control-M 
- Backup management using EDM (tapes) and disks with EMC storages
- Team operation over 6x3 shifts
profile_positions.title: Data Center Operator

profile_positions.description:
- Linux administration with Conectiva Linux, GNU/Linux Debian and RedHat Linux
- Network Monitoring with Nagios and MRTG
- Bash Scripting development 
- Web application development using ASP/ASP.NET
- Microsoft IIS 3/5 administration 
- Microsoft Windows NT/95/2000 administration
